text: bahudaivaviśvāsinikaḷe - avar viśvasikkunnat vare niṅṅaḷ vivāhaṁ kaḻikkarut‌. satyaviśvāsiniyāya oru aṭimastrīyāṇ bahudaivaviśvāsiniyekkāḷ nallat‌. avaḷ niṅṅaḷkk katukaṁ janippiccāluṁ śari. bahudaivaviśvāsikaḷkk avar viśvasikkunnat vare niṅṅaḷ vivāhaṁ kaḻippicc keāṭukkukayuṁ ceyyarut‌. satyaviśvāsiyāya oru aṭimayāṇ bahudaivaviśvāsiyekkāḷ nallat‌. avan niṅṅaḷkk katukaṁ janippiccāluṁ śari. akkūṭṭar narakattilēkkāṇ kṣaṇikkunnat‌. allāhuvākaṭṭe avanṟe hitamanusaricc svargattilēkkuṁ, pāpamēācanattilēkkuṁ kṣaṇikkunnu. janaṅṅaḷ śrad'dhicc manas'silākkuvān vēṇṭi tanṟe teḷivukaḷ avarkk vivariccukeāṭukkukayuṁ ceyyunnu
